round_best: Develop a generative adversarial network (GAN) that collaborates with an environmental simulation engine to create highly varied, realistic training datasets for image super-resolution. The simulation engine can generate a wide range of environmental conditions (like different weather patterns, lighting conditions, and physical obstructions) that affect image quality, while the GAN would learn to adapt these conditions into the training process dynamically. This system would not only provide a robust training dataset that mimics real-world degradations but also allow the super-resolution models to adaptively learn and improve performance across otherwise unseen conditions.
